definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Greek origin, derived from the Roman family name Antonius, commonly used in English-speaking and European countries as a personal name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自希腊语的男性名，由罗马家族名 Antonius 演变而来，广泛用于英语国家及欧洲各国作为人名。
definitions.example_en: Anton is a talented musician who performs in orchestras across Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 安东是一位才华横溢的音乐家，在欧洲各地的交响乐团演出。
